original_text: And Pilate answered and said again unto them, What will ye then that I shall do unto him whom ye call the King of the Jews?
korean_text: 빌라도가 또 대답하여 이르되 그러면 너희가 유대인의 왕이라 하는 이를 내가 어떻게 하랴

sentences.original_text: And Pilate answered and said again unto them
What will ye then that I shall do unto him
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 내가 그에게 무엇을 하기를 원하느냐

sentences.original_text: whom ye call the King of the Jews?
